text: Besides improving PMO cellular uptake , the CPP moiety was also shown to intensify PMO antisense activity against EBOV by 10 - to 100 - fold in cell - free translation assays [ 64 ] . These results are consistent with the findings of Nelson et a l . who showed that PPMOs exhibited antisense activity 3 - to 25 - fold higher than corresponding PMOs while bearing lower off - target effects [ 87 ] . The authors propose that the arginine - rich peptides enhance RNA - PMO binding affinity thereby increasing specific antisense activity .
